title: Jr. UI/UX Designer
description:
We are looking for a creative and detail-oriented Junior UI/UX Designer to join our design team. The ideal candidate will assist in designing user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces for web and mobile applications, working under the guidance of senior designers and collaborating with cross-functional teams. This role is perfect for someone passionate about user experience and eager to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities:

Assist in creating engaging, user-friendly designs for websites and mobile applications.
Work closely with senior designers to turn requirements into wireframes, prototypes, and polished designs.
Conduct user research and gather insights to inform design decisions.
Participate in design discussions and feedback sessions with stakeholders.
Ensure designs align with the brand’s identity and enhance user experience.
Collaborate with developers to ensure accurate implementation of design specifications.
Maintain and update design assets and documentation for future reference.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, or a related field (or relevant experience).
Basic understanding of UI/UX design principles, including user-centered design and usability.
Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe XD, Figma, or Sketch.
Familiarity with wireframing, prototyping, and visual design principles.
Good communication skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and take constructive feedback.

Key Benefits

Working in a fast-paced tech start-up environment
Attractive salary and incentives for high-quality work
Flexible schedule
Health Insurance
Five Working Days
Provident Fund

Job Type: Full-time

title: Junior Flutter Developer (1–2 Years Experience)
description:
We are seeking a passionate and detail-oriented Junior Flutter Developer with 1 to 2 years of experience to join our growing team. In this role, you’ll help develop high-quality cross-platform mobile applications, with a particular focus on iPad-optimized experiences. This is a great opportunity to sharpen your skills and grow alongside a collaborative and supportive team.

Key Responsibilities

Assist in the development and maintenance of mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.
Support the creation of responsive and optimized applications for iPad and other tablet devices.
Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend developers to deliver user-friendly features.
Help integrate RESTful APIs and third-party libraries to extend app functionality.
Troubleshoot and resolve bugs to ensure smooth app performance.
Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code following best practices.
Participate in code reviews and contribute to team learning and documentation.
Stay current with the latest Flutter updates and mobile development trends.

Requirements

1–2 years of hands-on experience in mobile app development using Flutter.
Exposure to developing or optimizing apps for iPad or tablet devices.
Proficiency in Dart and understanding of mobile development concepts.
Basic experience integrating APIs and working with third-party libraries.
Good grasp of UI/UX principles and the mobile development lifecycle.
Familiarity with Git or other version control systems.
Experience publishing or contributing to apps on the Google Play Store and/or Apple App Store.
Strong problem-solving abilities and keen attention to detail.
Eagerness to learn and grow within a fast-paced development environment.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: Rs50,000.00 - Rs70,000.00 per month

Work Location: In person

Application Deadline: 21/06/2025

title: Junior MERN Stack Developer (Part-Time, On-Site – Karachi Only)
description:
Please read the requirements carefully. Applications that do not match will not be considered.

About Us
Ascentedge Technologies & Consulting is a Karachi-based digital solutions company, delivering results-driven web and mobile apps, UI/UX design, and digital marketing. We thrive on collaboration, creativity, and delivering impact for our clients.

About the Role
We’re looking for a Junior MERN Stack Developer to join our team part-time, on-site in Karachi. This is a 4-hour/day opportunity during EST time zone hours – ideal for candidates who already have 6 months to 1 year of hands-on MERN experience and are eager to learn in a professional environment.

Important Note:
This is not a remote or freelance role. Please apply only if you can commute to our office in Karachi and are available during EST hours.

Key Responsibilities

Build and maintain web apps using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js
Work with designers and product teams to implement new features
Write clean, modular, and scalable code
Debug and optimize performance issues
Take ownership of your tasks and deliver on time

You Should Have

6 months to 1 year of practical experience in the MERN stack
Solid understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Familiarity with Git and REST APIs
Strong communication and problem-solving skills
Availability to work 4 hours/day on-site in Karachi during EST hours
Willingness to grow in a fast-moving, collaborative startup environment

Job Type: Part-time

Expected hours: 20 per week

Application Question(s):

We need to fill this position urgently. Can you start immediately? If you can't join within 1 week, please do not apply.
What are your salary expectations for this position?
How many months of hands-on experience do you have working with the MERN stack?
Are you available to work on-site in Karachi during EST time zone hours (4 hours/day)?

Work Location: In person

Application Deadline: 09/07/2025

title: Jr. Flutter Developer
description:
We are looking for a passionate and proactive Junior Flutter Developer to join our development team. As a junior team member, you will work under the guidance of senior developers to design and build cross-platform mobile applications using the Flutter framework. This is a great opportunity to grow your skills in a supportive, fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities

Assist in the development and maintenance of cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate designs into high-quality code.
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
Perform unit and integration testing.
Debug and resolve technical issues and bugs.
Stay up to date with new trends and best practices in mobile development.

Requirements

Basic knowledge of Flutter and Dart programming language.
Understanding of REST APIs, third-party integrations, and Firebase.
Familiarity with Git version control.
Good problem-solving skills and a willingness to learn.
Ability to work both independently and as part of a team.
Strong communication skills.

Preferred (Nice to Have)

Any published Flutter app on Play Store or App Store.
Experience with Firebase, Push Notifications, and local storage.
Knowledge of state management techniques like Provider, BLoC, or Riverpod.
Internship or project experience with Flutter.

Education

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (final-year students may also apply).

What We Offer

Friendly and collaborative work environment
Growth opportunities and mentorship
Flexible hours (if applicable)
Competitive salary based on experience

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: Rs50,000.00 - Rs80,000.00 per month

Work Location: In person

title: Junior Graphic Designer
description:
About the Company:

Tens Sourcing is a fast-growing e-commerce service provider specializing in empowering e-commerce brands to achieve their full potential. Our services include listing optimization, advertising strategy, brand management, and more. We are currently managing the best seller brand Tens Towels on Amazon.

Position Title: Junior Graphic Designer

Company: Tens Sourcing

Location: DHA Phase 8, Karachi, Pakistan (On-site)

Job Timings: Monday – Saturday 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM

Job Type: Full-Time (On-site)

Experience Required: 6 months – 1 year (Fresh graduates with strong portfolios may apply)

Job Summary:

We are hiring a Junior Graphic Designer to assist in creating visually appealing and brand-consistent designs for Amazon listings, marketing campaigns, and social media. The ideal candidate should have a good aesthetic sense, attention to detail, and the ability to work in a fast-paced e-commerce environment.

Key Responsibilities:

Design, edit and finalize product images, infographics, and A+ Content for Amazon listings.
Assist in developing creative assets for social media, email campaigns, and website banners.
Work closely with the photography, content and marketing team to translate ideas into high-quality visuals.
Ensure all designs follow brand guidelines and Amazon compliance standards.
Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute fresh, creative design ideas.
Edit and retouch product photos
Keep up with design trends relevant to e-commerce and the home decor niche.

Requirements:

Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Canva.
Basic understanding of Amazon image requirements.
Strong design sense with the ability to balance creativity and clarity.
Ability to work with feedback and make revisions quickly.
Good communication and time management skills.
A portfolio showcasing previous design work is mandatory.
Experience designing Amazon A+ Content is a plus.
Motion graphics or basic video editing knowledge.
Familiarity with Amazon tools or UI/UX principles.

Job Type: Full-time

Education:

Bachelor's (Required)

Experience:

Graphic Designing: 1 year (Required)

Location:

Karachi (Required)

title: Junior Php and laravel developer
description:
Job Summary:

We are looking for a Junior PHP Laravel Developer to join our development team. In this role, you’ll assist in building and maintaining web applications using Laravel and PHP. This is a great opportunity for someone with foundational development experience who is eager to learn and grow in a collaborative environment.

Responsibilities:

Assist in the development and maintenance of Laravel-based web applications
Write clean, secure, and well-documented PHP code
Work with front-end developers and UI/UX designers to implement features
Integrate third-party services and APIs
Collaborate on troubleshooting, debugging, and performance optimization
Manage and maintain databases using MySQL or similar technologies
Participate in code reviews and team meetings
Stay updated with new technologies and best practices.

Job Type: Full-time

Work Location: In person

title: Web Developer
description:
Job Information

Division: Online

Age Bracket: 30-36 years

Position Available: 1

Shift Schedule: Mon-Fri 10:00 AM-7:00 PM

Area: Block 9, Clifton

Chapal is an emerging yet a globally-recognized company providing a reliable platform to deploy cloud infrastructure using high-end and purpose-built data centres. Probably having the fastest cloud platform across the world, the rapidly-growing startups and large enterprises trust Chapal to run their databases and applications with minimum latency in order to become faster, more innovative and agile. With us, the clients get to discover and break the boundaries of scalability, performance and reliability. Our platform is ideal for high-end traffic platforms where availability is critical. In short, we build custom solutions that matches the unique needs of our clients. As our client base is rapidly growing and covers every industry there is, Chapal is becoming one of the leading cloud service providers operating from Pakistan.


Role Overview
Chapal is looking for an attentive Web Developer who has a knack for development. The candidate should be primarily proficient in server-side web development and have experience in front-end development using HTML, CSS and client-side scripting. The developer will be working to maintain, update and enhance application by understanding the requirements tailed for better interface.

Job Responsibilities

Translate project requirements into functional and visually appealing application solutions
Develop responsive and interactive applications using modern front-end technologies; HTML, CSS, JavaScript and frameworks; React or Angular
Implement efficient back-end functionality using server-side technologies; PHP and connect front-end interfaces to databases and APIs
Create intuitive and visually appealing interfaces using industry best practices and design principles
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to ensure seamless integration of design elements into the development process
Optimise web application performance, considering factors like page load speed, responsiveness and browser compatibility
Conduct thorough testing of web applications to identify and fix bugs, ensuring optimal functionality and user experience
Perform cross-browser and cross-platform testing to ensure consistent performance across different environments
Work on quality assurance by developing and executing testing strategies and ensure high-quality deliverables
Utilise version control systems to manage code repositories and facilitate collaboration within the team
Deploy web applications to hosting environments, ensuring proper configuration and adherence to security best practices
Monitor and troubleshoot deployment issues to resolve any technical challenges
Participate in code reviews, provide constructive feedback and continually seek opportunities to enhance code quality and maintainability
Share knowledge and contribute to the growth and skill development of junior developers within the team




Job Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or an equivalent degree in the relevant field
Minimum of 5+ years of work experience as a Web Developer
Expertise in front-end and back-end development
Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and front-end frameworks/libraries (React, Angular Js)
Experience with server-side technologies and PHP frameworks
Familiarity with SQL database management system and RESTful API integration
Knowledge of responsive design principles, UI/UX best practices and cross-browser compatibility
Familiarity with version control systems and agile development methodologies
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to troubleshoot complex issues and propose effective solutions
Strong communication skills in English Language



Facebook | X | Instagram | YouTube | LinkedIn | Snapchat | TikTok | Google Business

title: Senior Mobile App Developer (Flutter)
description:
Job Summary:

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Mobile App Developer with a strong focus on Flutter to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for the design, development, and maintenance of robust and scalable mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.

Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable mobile applications for iOS and/or Android platforms using Flutter.
Implement complex features and functionalities, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
Integrate with RESTful APIs and other backend services.
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues.
Lead the development of specific projects or modules.
Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
Mentor and guide junior developers, fostering their professional growth.
Contribute to architectural discussions and decisions.
Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to define and refine project requirements.
Communicate effectively with team members and other departments.
Participate in agile development processes, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Write and maintain unit and integration tests.
Ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices.
Perform thorough testing and debugging to identify and resolve issues.
Participate in testing and deployment of CI/CD pipelines.
Stay up-to-date with the latest mobile development trends and technologies.
Proactively identify and recommend improvements to processes and technologies.
Contribute to the development of reusable components and libraries.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
5+ years of professional experience in mobile application development.
4+ years of experience with Flutter framework.
Proven experience in designing, developing, and deploying mobile applications for iOS and Android.
Strong understanding of mobile UI/UX principles.
Solid understanding of object-oriented programming principles and design patterns.
Experience with state management solutions (e.g., Provider, Riverpod, Bloc).
Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Experience with native mobile development (iOS or Android) in addition to Flutter.
Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

title: Senior Consultant - Application Development
description:
Role Overview:seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior MEAN Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will specialize in developing micro frontends using Angular and microservices using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. You will play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining scalable, modular, and high-performance applications while ensuring seamless integration across the front-end and back-end systems.




Key Responsibilities:1. Micro frontend Development (Angular):o Architect and develop modular micro frontends using Angular.o Implement dynamic and reusable UI components to ensure scalability and maintainability.o Optimize front-end performance for seamless user experiences.o Collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate designs into responsive web applications.

2. Microservices Development (Node.js, Express, MongoDB):o Design and develop scalable microservices using Node.js and Express.o Build RESTful APIs and integrate them with front-end applications.o Implement database schemas and queries using SQL & NoSQL MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval.o Ensure high availability, fault tolerance, and security of microservices.

3. System Architecture and Design:o Develop and maintain a modular architecture that supports micro frontends and microservices.o Ensure proper communication and data flow between micro frontends and microservices.

4. Code Quality and Best Practices:o Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code following industry best practices.o Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers.o Implement unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing to ensure application reliability.

5. Performance Optimization:o Monitor and optimize application performance, scalability, and reliability.o Identify and resolve bottlenecks in both front-end and back-end systems.6. Continuous Improvement:o Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in MEAN stack development.o Proactively suggest improvements to existing systems and processes.

Required Skills and Qualifications:




Technical Skills:o Front-End: Expertise in Angular (version 13+), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, and RxJS.o
Back-End: Proficiency in Node.js, Express.js, and RESTful API development.o
Database: Strong knowledge of Oracle, MongoDB, including schema design and query optimization.o
Micro frontends: Experience in designing and implementing micro frontendarchitectures.o
Microservices: Hands-on experience in building and deploying microservices.o
Version Control: Proficiency in Git and Git-based workflows.2.
Experience:o Minimum 5+ years of experience in MEAN stack development.o Proven track record of developing micro frontends and microservices.o Experience with Agile methodologies and DevOps practices.

title: Team Lead .Net Developer
description:
We are looking for a Team LEAD Developer with a strong foundation in .NET MVC and modern development practices. This is an exciting opportunity for someone who is not only technically proficient but also energetic, proactive, and passionate about building high-quality software solutions.

You will work closely with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain robust applications, while also mentoring junior developers and contributing to architectural decisions.

Key Responsibilities:

Design, develop, test, and maintain scalable applications using .NET MVC , Core.

Collaborate with product managers, UI/UX designers, and QA engineers to deliver features that meet business needs.

Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.

Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and continuous improvement initiatives.

Take ownership of end-to-end feature delivery.

Mentor and guide junior developers.

Stay updated with the latest industry trends and advocate for modern development practices.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

4+ years of professional experience in software development.

Strong expertise in .NET MVC, C#, and Abstract method .

Proficiency in front-end frameworks (e.g., Angular, React, or Blazor) is a plus.

Experience with RESTful APIs, SQL Server, and Entity Framework.

Familiarity with cloud platforms (preferably Azure or AWS).

Strong understanding of software design patterns, data structures, and algorithms.

Experience with CI/CD, version control systems (e.g., Git), and Agile methodologies.

Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Energetic, enthusiastic, and eager to learn and grow in a collaborative environment.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: Rs300,000.00 - Rs350,000.00 per month

Application Question(s):

What is expected salary?

Experience:

Team Lead: 1 year (Preferred)
.NET MVC : 4 years (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

title: Senior Flutter Developer
description:
We are looking for a Senior Flutter Developer to lead the development of high-performance, scalable, and visually engaging mobile applications. You will work closely with cross-functional teams including product managers, UI/UX designers, and backend developers to deliver innovative solutions that meet business objectives.

Key Responsibilities:

Design and build advanced mobile applications using Flutter for both Android and iOS.
Lead architecture and design discussions for new features and apps.
Write clean, maintainable, and testable code with best practices in mind.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
Mentor junior developers and contribute to team knowledge sharing.
Stay up to date with the latest Flutter releases, libraries, and best practices.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience).
4+ years of mobile development experience.
Strong understanding of Dart and Flutter architecture (BLoC, Provider, Riverpod, etc.).
Experience with RESTful APIs, third-party libraries, and Firebase.
Proficient in Git, Agile methodologies, and CI/CD practices.
Experience with platform-specific integrations (native modules in Android/iOS).
Strong debugging and optimization skills.

Preferred Qualifications

Experience in publishing apps to Google Play and App Store.
Familiarity with automated testing and performance tuning.
Knowledge of state management patterns.
Contributions to open-source Flutter projects or published personal projects.

Location: Bahria Town, Karachi.

Transportation provided for the following locations: Sohrab Goth, Ayesha Manzil, Yaseenabad, Rub Medical Center, Gulshan Chowrangi, Luckey One Shopping Mall, 5 Star Chowrangi, Nagan Chowrangi, Power House Chowrangi, Shafeeq More, Model Colony, Malir halt, Rafah-e-Aam Society, Colony Gate, Scheme 33, Safoora Goth, CP 5 / CP 6 Malir Cantt.

Job Type: Full-time

Application Question(s):

Rate yourself in Flutter architecture out of 10.
Rate yourself in Dart out of 10.
Rate your proficiency in Git, Agile methodologies, and CI/CD practices.
Please mention your full address with the specified sector or block and the nearest landmark to your location.

Experience:

Flutter and Dart programming languages: 3 years (Required)
full mobile development life cycle: 2 years (Required)
RESTful APIs, third-party libraries, and Firebase.: 2 years (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

Application Deadline: 06/07/2025
